@usedefaults

h2. Macro Logs

h3. Description

Shows a datatables grid with all logs in the system depending on the filters

h3. Filters

||Name||Description||
|nid|Node id the log was recorded on|
|pid|Process id the log was recorded on|
|jid|Job id the job should be executed on|
|from|time ago when the log was recorded|
|to|time ago to filter till the logs was recorded|
